skills.name: Torpedo Expert (魚雷の名人)
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, 100% chance to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Taking a breather (束の間の休憩)
skills.text:
1. Increases Stamina Recovery by 50% when at First Speed.
2. When battle starts, increases Allied Fleet speed by 30%. Every 5s thereafter, this buff is weakened by 10% till 0%.
Buff will also disappear if an enemy fleet [Main Battery Salvo] circle fills up or lands a [Torpedo Salvo].
